item.description:
Problem Solving

How do you solve problems? We'll look at many options - brainstorming, thinking outside the box, getting support, making an initial decision, taking risks, clarifying the problem, reading articles, google search, seeing how others problem solve, listening, meditation, etc. Bring some problems to solve!

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed, is a relationship coach, personal life coach and individual, couples and family therapist. He has been teaching workshops for over 30 years. Learn from his experience.

Call or email anytime with questions, herb@herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Problem Solving
